snippet.title: Aliens on the Table Trailer and game play video
snippet.description:
Aliens on the Table is a augmented reality game for ios and android

Aliens on the Table is an augmented reality game,where the player shoot the aliens who try to invade us. Its the final Battle of the war where aliens try to send a message for their home asking for a backup through a portal which they try to build. The primary objective of the game is to stop the Aliens from sending a portal message and ultimately winning the war and you also have soldiers to fight on your side, you have the your own team to back you up and win the war against aliens.

All you got to do is download the pdf from the below given link, print it (preferably A4 or A3)out and place it in your desktop, the game level will pop right on top of it.

The game has waves of aliens trying to build the portal at 4 different environment where it has be destroyed. Aliens are equipped with their own weapons so ammos has to be evaded every now and then.

welcome to the Alien war on your desk, now is the time to stop from invading your desk, you have every possible artillery at your disposal ranging from pistol to bazooka and occasionally you will grab special powers by killing aliens.

Zombie Character designed at the world class studio of 3DRT

Cool Cartoony Environment from Manufactura K4
